sentences.en: A man's shoes get tight by imbibe water, but he do not.
sentences.cn: 人穿的鞋子会因吸饱了水而变紧,惟其本人则不会(醉).

sentences.en: Both men imbibed considerable quantities of gin.
sentences.cn: 这两个男人都喝了大量的杜松子酒。

sentences.en: I always imbibe fresh air in the woods.
sentences.cn: 我经常在树林里呼吸新鲜空气.

sentences.en: It was advantageous to animals digest and imbibe soybean's nutrition composition.
sentences.cn: 有利于家畜对其营养成分的消化和吸收.

sentences.en: Lounge patrons desperately wanted to imbibe the essence of all this.
sentences.cn: 酒吧的老主顾们极欲将全部精华吸收殆尽.

sentences.en: Plants imbibe nourishment usually through their leaves and roots.
sentences.cn: 植物通常经过叶和根吸收养分.

sentences.en: She had imbibed the traditions of her family.
sentences.cn: 她受到了自己家庭传统的影响。

sentences.en: These plants imbibe moisture through their roots.
sentences.cn: 这些植物通过根部吸收水分.

trans.tran_en: to accept and be influenced by qualities, ideas, values etc
